name: Sarape – Los Arcos, Animas, Quimixto
description: All aboard Santamarias Trimaran….head out on one of Puerto Vallarta’s famous bay cruises! This is an excellent way to spend your day cruising along the Banderas Bay while stopping at remote beaches only reached by boat. On the Bahia Alegre bay cruise you can enjoy everything from a wide variety of drinks, dancing, sightseeing, snorkeling, kayaking, and horse backing riding (horses are $15.00 extra).
